CHANGELOG

Current Build - 0.44.8
 
Added Features:
	None

Bug Fixes:

0.44.8
	Crash caused by duplicate entries in the Install Log file. (the dreaded "an item with the same key has already been added" crash).
	Uninstalling a plugin caused the program to remove it from the plugin list even if a previous version was restored.
	A readonly check preventing the program from restoring a previous file version if the file to restore was set to readonly.
	The mod manager will now automatically uninstall a mod whose mod archive is missing instead of crashing the program.
	Deleting a mod while having multiple mods selected also removed all the selected mods from the list even though the mod deletion method only works on a single mods.
	Rare crash with the saved column sorting.
	Bug that prevented the program from obtaining updated mod info from a new version of the mod archive.
